item.title: .htaccess←AnchorCMS
item.description: #Options -indexes <IfModule mod_rewrite.c> RewriteEngine On RewriteBase / # Allow any files or directories that exist to be displayed directly RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d # Rewrite all other URLs to index.php/URL RewriteRule ^(.*)$ index.php?/$1 \[L] </IfModule> <IfModule !mod_rewrite.c> ErrorDocument 404 index.php </IfModule> #Options -indexes さくらサーバーはOptionが使えないからコメン
